comments:
1. build 0609 and no CM
2. create a new lib
3. import a plugin
4. click on each content elements and processes
5. click on Config,
6. then click on one of the process
7. got internal error, (see below)

This seem to be an refresh/workspace sync up related issue.  Once I reopen the lib, the same cp works fine.
